## AxisScaleType enumeration

Specifies the possible scale types for an axis.

```csharp
public enum AxisScaleType
```

## Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Linear | `0` | Linear scaling. |
| Logarithmic | `1` | Logarithmic scaling. |
